paragraphs.text: Why #illridewithyou is an ill ride.
paragraphs.label: title

paragraphs.text: The Sydney siege saw a slew of Muslim organisations issue statements condemning Islamic extremism
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: Such chastisement had meant something in the wake of 9/11 and the Bali bombings
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Today, this has degraded into an automated knee-jerk response
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It has been said so many times that its gravitas is greatly diminished
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: More subtly, this expectation for Muslims to keep speaking out is nothing short of Islamophobic
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It assumes that Islam is, at its core, evil
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: It also upholds the view that Muslims can be essentialised as a monolithic whole
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The chastisement thus becomes the yardstick from which the wider world is to differentiate between a good Muslim and a bad Muslim
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Surely today, fourteen years after 9/11, we have wisened up to the fact that such atrocious acts are committed out of political, even criminal, intent more than theology
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Surely, it is not a stretch to think that no one individual can represent an entire faith community
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: . Surely, it is time, as Max Fisher of Vox argues, to stop asking Muslims to condemn terrorism
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In the same manner, this good Muslim, bad Muslim binary undergirds the #illridewithyou campaign
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Yes, the hashtag was borne out of goodwill
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: an Asian Australian woman started it
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: as the Twitter universe reacted to the story of a woman pledging to walk in solidarity with another woman who took her hijab off following news of the Sydney siege
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: We will protect the good Muslims, so gestures the campaign
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Unfortunately, it also reproduces an age-old trope that has been highlighted by scholars of postcolonial studies
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: As western colonisers encounter non-European natives, they began to think of their "other" in one of two antithetical ways - either as a barbaric savage or a noble savage
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: To the colonisers, the hostile savage is inherently dangerous in a sub-human way and always an enemy to the civilised individual
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Meanwhile, the noble savage is romanticised as innately benign
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Untouched by modernisation, the noble savage should be admired and protected
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Transposed to modern times, the hostile savage translates as the bad Muslim and the noble savage - the good Muslim
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Yet
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: barbaric or noble, a savage is still a savage
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: The hashtag #illridewithyou is just as patronising
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Another factor that cast doubt to #illridewithyou relates to this question: Was the perpetrator Man Haron Monis the quintessential Islamic extremist?
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: If
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: the slate of profile pieces that are now just flooding our newsfeed can be taken as a gauge
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: the jury is still out on this
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: At first glance, one may indeed be tempted to fit him into the mould of what some security experts have called"bedroom jihadists", a fashionable term to describe self-radicalised individuals who have been recruited online to plan and execute terror attacks that would advance the cause of clandestine Islamist organisations
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Yet Monis was a man of many masks
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Closer inspection would reveal that he does not nestle comfortably into this category
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: His demands may have included an ISIL flag
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: but
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: he made no strategic overtures that would advance the cause of any oppressed Muslim groups
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: At this juncture, it is doubtful if he had even made contact with ISIL
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Let us also not forget that Monis was not a nobody who was secretly being turned to the ways of ISIL or any other Islamist agenda
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: In fact
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: he was a well-known criminal
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Not only had Monis been charged with being an accessory to the brutal murder of his wife last year, he had also been slapped with 22 counts of aggravated sexual assault and 14 counts of aggravated indecent assault
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: In addition
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: information has surfaced that he had been charged with fraud in Iran
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: which requested his extradition from Australia some 14 years ago
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: As
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: a friend rightly pointed out on social media, Monis' criminal records qualify him as a "sexual predator and misogynist"
paragraphs.label: testimony

paragraphs.text: Yet
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: this more dominant aspect of his identity has not stopped the rest of the world from linking the Sydney siege to the threat of Islamic fundamentalism
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: Yet consider this
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: During the Sydney siege, a shooting spree incidence unfolded in Montgomery County, Pennsylvania that left 6 dead
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: International media agencies described the perpetrator, the now-deceased Bradley William Stone, simply as "a suspect", "a gunman on the loose" and even "a Montgomery man"
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: No hashtag campaign was necessary to assure white people that the rest of the world will ride with them to keep them safe
paragraphs.label: common-ground

paragraphs.text: The same can be observed of the reaction to the mass killings committed by the Norwegian Anders Breivik in 2011
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: While
paragraphs.label: no-unit

paragraphs.text: Breivik had claimed himself a baptised Christian in his 1,500-page manifesto
paragraphs.label: anecdote

paragraphs.text: the world did not expect Christians to condemn terrorism in the same way Muslims had
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: This discrepancy is telling of the power imbalance of our contemporary world
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: To white Australia, #illridewithyou may be its golden moment
paragraphs.label: assumption

paragraphs.text: To the rest of the coloured world, nothing has changed
paragraphs.label: assumption
